title: I'm honestly very glad Aphelios can out so fast after Senna
body:
That means the next champion is the anticipated Ionian juggernaut who thrives in the center of a fight. The hype is real. Hoping it's an All might type of champion

http://sewbeckyjo.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/My-Hero-Academia-character-3.jpg

replies.body: Plus Ultra
Oop, a Rioter comment folks. Ionian All-Might confirmed.

I don't think your post went through right. Check in the Memes section where Laughing Fish left a tutorial about posting images and the like.

I'm hoping for Yang as a champion.
https://imgur.com/6k1bsEN.png[]

After the RWBY/SMITE collab, I wanna burn in LoL.

> https://imgur.com/6k1bsEN.png[]

> After the RWBY/SMITE collab, I wanna burn in LoL.

League doesn't need more Mary Sues

Also, {{champion:254}}
Ionia States of Smash!

> [{quoted}](name=Neamean,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=NGgHEAXn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-25T18:12:28.040+0000)

> Ionia States of Smash!

> [{quoted}](name=Bultz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=NGgHEAXn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-11-25T20:01:19.884+0000)
>
> https://66.media.tumblr.com/90984d0007b58392811f41778ea7c013/tumblr_pafzgeE2YO1smw5dno1_400.gif

Great City of Smash! But no seriously have you never played Galio?{{champion:3}}
Pantheon actually has the same voice actor as All Might in Japan: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G_SV8MEzLFY

> [{quoted}](name=SkiptoMyLuo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=NGgHEAXn,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-11-26T18:37:58.372+0000)
>
> Pantheon actually has the same voice actor as All Might in Japan: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G_SV8MEzLFY

You guys got Kenta Miyake to do Pantheons voice? I had no idea, thats fucking sick. I love his voice in MHA! I hope the new champion has someone just as awesome.

I’m excuuuuuuuuse me sue, but {{champion:3}} is the all-might champion.

Fake snide-ness aside ditto. I love the Juggernaut class of champions especially when they’re well designed with their strengths and weaknesses taken into account.

> [{quoted}](name=jocomotion,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=NGgHEAXn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-26T04:19:03.178+0000)
>
> I’m excuuuuuuuuse me sue, but {{champion:3}} is the all-might champion.
> 
> Fake snide-ness aside ditto. I love the Juggernaut class of champions especially when they’re well designed with their strengths and weaknesses taken into account.

I was actually about to say that. Like has the OP never played Galio before? P.S. You want the All for One champion. {{champion:517}}

> [{quoted}](name=jocomotion,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=NGgHEAXn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-26T04:19:03.178+0000)
>
> I’m excuuuuuuuuse me sue, but {{champion:3}} is the all-might champion.
> 
> Fake snide-ness aside ditto. I love the Juggernaut class of champions especially when they’re well designed with their strengths and weaknesses taken into account.

My people <3
The gender is still not decided yet
Male because Vi is female.

As someone who is loving juggernauts right now, I am looking forward to the next new champion.
> Out of the Ionian underground comes a smokin’ hot new juggernaut. It’s been a while since we made a more straightforward, accessible juggernaut

Heck yeah! They better deliver on the smokin' hot. They mentioned Darius so that's already a good start. An All Might champion would work for me.
Please make his skin look like Almight and do another Battle Academia skin line for his release.
I wounder if the ionian juggernaut will be a pig?

> [{quoted}](name=IceKingChernobog,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=NGgHEAXn,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-11-26T19:52:06.485+0000)
>
> I wounder if the ionian juggernaut will be a pig?

lol I hope not, a pig is usually lame and they have no fists, they have hooves. A tiger, a wolf, a gorilla would be my preference. Something cool.

Now for a lesson, You may have heard these words before, but i'll show you what they really mean...

Go Beyond,
